com.engineersbox.httpproxy.formatting.content

Interface BaseContentFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentFormatter

    public interface BaseContentFormatter
    Base interface for a formatter to handle text replacement

      • getContentString

        java.lang.String getContentString()
        Retrieve the content string currently stored. If any replacements have been performed, this string will contain them
        Returns:
        Formatted content String
